lead_paragraph: LEVY--Norma. The Board, Administration and Staff of the Gurwin Jewish Nursing & Rehabilitation Center express their heartfelt sympathy at the passing of Norma, beloved wife of our Chairman Emeritus, Al Levy. Norma was a passionate and devoted advocate for the founding and growth of our Center. She will long be remembered for her commitment to those we serve. We extend sincere condolences to Al and the entire family. Lawrence Simon, Chairman Bert E. Brodsky, President Herbert Friedman, EVP/CEO 1/3
